title: All my albums were deleted when I backedup my camera roll I need to download all the photos again!!
content: So after backing up my camera roll I went to make a edit with pictures in my camera roll so I went to my gallery on the app and there was no photos or videos so I went to Snapchat and I pressed camera roll and it says I have to photos my photos show up when I go to the app photos Buti have no album. And I have to download all my photos again to make them show up! Please help me on how to get them all back!!! üôèüèº
